content: अभिचारः {@--1@} Exorcising, enchanting employment of magical spells for malevolent purposes; magic itself (being regarded as one of the Upapātakas or minor sins); अभिचारेषु सर्वेषु कर्तव्यो द्विशतो दमः <ls>Ms. 9. 290</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">11. 64</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 11.">198</ls>; <ls>K. 109</ls>; <ls>Mv. 1. 62.</ls> {@--2@} Killing.
